actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide coverage under the Federal old age, survivors, and disability insurance system for all officers and employees of the United States and its instrumentalities other than those in the judicial branch.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends Title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act and the Internal Revenue Code to provide coverage under the Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance program for all officers and employees of the United States and its instrumentalities other than those in the judicial branch.

titles.title: A bill to provide coverage under the Federal old age, survivors, and disability insurance system for all officers and employees of the United States and its instrumentalities other than those in the judicial branch.
